mapper.insert: insert into student_answer(member_id, exam_info_num, question_num, exam_question_seq, student_answer_choice, student_answer_status) values(#{member_id}, #{exam_info_num}, #{question_num}, #{exam_question_seq}, #{student_answer_choice}, #{student_answer_status})
mapper.select: select question_answer from question where question_num = #{question_num}
